## Quality Control  {.tabset}

### Raw {.tabset}

#### Boxplot

```{r, out.width=pdf_width, out.height=out_height, fig.align="center", echo = FALSE}
file <- tar_read(qc_raw_boxplot_file)
knitr::include_graphics(file)
```
